name: Rods & Reels
description:
Description:

A fishing game about progression. You get fish with your fishing rod, and sell them to gather money to get better rods, reels, and bait! You use your upgrades to go even deeper and get bigger and better fish! You better watch out though, the deeper you go the harder it will be to dodge debris and navigate back up to the surface. Will you find out what lies at the bottom of the sea?

- THIS IS A PROTOTYPE NOT FINAL VERSION -

Controls:

Space to cast line

A to move hook Left

D to move hook Right

P to open and close shop

Esc to pause and main menu quit
